long_description: The Polar FlowLink Data transfer unit transfers training information from your heart rate monitor to polarpersonaltrainer.com web service. The Polar FlowLink Data transfer unit is compatible with the following Polar heart rate monitors: FA20, FT7, FT40, FT60, FT80, Polar Active and RS300X. System requirements for WebSync SW: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7 or Intel Mac OS X 10.5 (Leopard) or newer.
short_description: The Polar FlowLink Data transfer unit transfers training information from your heart rate monitor to polarpersonaltrainer.com web service.
